text: Cardeston is a small settlement in Shropshire, England. It is near the A458 road and is west of Shrewsbury. It is part of the civil parish of Alberbury with Cardeston. It has no facilities, apart from a Church of England church. ==See also== *Listed buildings in Alberbury with Cardeston ==References== ==External links== *Cardeston at Streetmap.co.uk Category:Villages in Shropshire
title: Cardeston
